org.aksw.deer.parameter

Interface ParameterMap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParameterMapImpl

    public interface ParameterMap
    A ParameterMap serves as registry of Parameters that can be used to configure a ParametrizedPlugin.

    A ParameterMap holds a list of Parameter instances upon its initialization, therefore acting as a registry of allowed Parameters.
    Furthermore, a ParameterMap supports setting values of its parameters either directly or automatically via ParameterConversion of a supplied RDF subgraph.
    Calling init(Resource) on a given ParameterMap will change its state to initialized and prevent further modification of its values, effectively making it immutable. It is mandatory to call init(Resource) before getting values from a ParameterMap.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ParameterMap EMPTY_INSTANCE
      An empty, unmodifiable instance

                      Object node)
               throws IllegalStateException
        Directly set a value for a parameter.

        p - the parameter which should be set
        node - the value to set for the given parameter

        this ParameterMap, for method chaining

        <T> T getValue(Parameter p)

        Get the value for the given parameter. Makes use of return type inference to avoid manual casting.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • getValue

        <T> T getValue(Parameter p,
               T defaultValue)
        throws IllegalStateException
        Get the value for the given parameter, or the defaultValue, if it has not been set. Makes use of return type inference to avoid manual casting.
        Type Parameters:
        T - this methods generic return type
        Parameters:
        p - the parameter to get
        defaultValue - a defaultValue as fallback
        Returns:
        defaultVaue if the value has not been set or has been set to null; otherwise, the value of parameter p
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this ParameterMap has not been initialized yet

      • init

        ParameterMap init(Resource r)
        Initialize this ParameterMap, making it immutable and enabling the getters.
        Parameters:
        r - if not null, this Resource and its corresponding subgraph will be used for automatic parameter value assignment
        Returns:
        this ParameterMap, for method chaining
